metadata.title: CVE-2021-44269 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: An out of bounds read was found in Wavpack 5.4.0 in processing *.WAV files.This issue triggered in function WavpackPackSamples of filesrc/pack_utils.c, tainted variable cnt is too large, that makes pointersptr read beyond heap bound.

criterions.comment: wavpack package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
